title: Make Ingest Request
name: Make_Ingest_Request
description: Allows you to ingest a new video into the Once system

Parameter.description: The domain id for your Once account
The id for the digital media catalog for your domain

Request Body Fields.description: The title of the asset (max length: 255 characters)
The unique identifier for the asset (max length: 150 characters)
A description of the asset
Array of keyword strings associated with the video
A map of key value pairs for Extended Metadata
The key of an Extended Metadata key value pair (see the example below for key/value pairs)
Container for the source URL of the asset being ingested
The URL string to the source asset
An array of Publication Rules for the asset
The Channel Guid for the Publication Rule
The start date for the Publication Rule (epoch time in seconds)
The end date for the Publication Rule (epoch time in seconds)
An array of Client Filters for the Publication Rule
The variable name that the Client Filter will key off of
The value name that the Client Filter will key off of
The type of filtering used to compare the value
Denotes whether a successful comparison of the Client Filter is denied or allowed
An array of Country Rules for the asset
The Country Code for the Country Rule (ISO 639 2-letter code, such as "CA")
Denotes whether a successful comparison of the Client Filter is denied or allowed
An array of Cue Points for the asset
The time in which the Cue Point will be inserted (integer)
The type of unit the time value
An array of Timed Text items for the asset
Container for the source URL of the timed text file being ingested
The URL string to the source asset
The type to categorize the timed text item
An array of languages contained in the timed text asset (ISO-639 language codes)
The optional id to associate with the timed text item, used as a descriptor or to create uniqueness
An array of Notifications to be fired during ingest
The HTTP endpoint or sns target for your notification
The type of notification to be associated with, defaults to publish

examples.title: Ingest Request Body Example:

Error 4xx.description: 401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your api key is correct
Errors 404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested

examples.title: 400 Error Response
